content.query:
USE DB_0815
GO
CREATE OR ALTER PROC Creates@LServerlessView_gold @ViewName nvarchar (100)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS
        SELECT *
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
            BULK ''https://adlsgen2synapse0815.dfs.core.windows.net/fsonprem0815/SalesLT/'+ @ViewName + '/'',
            FORMAT = ''DELTA''
        ) as [result]
    '

EXEC (@statement)

END
GO
